untappd.author: Peter Skopa @swetoast
untappd.title: Untappd
untappd.short_description: Checks your untappd info and keeps you updated from home-assistant

required.username: The username of the Untappd user, you want updates for.

untappd.instructions: You will need to apply for an [API from Untappd](https://untappd.com/api) to use this.
